description:
Keep your beach baby safe in the sun with this full-piece suit. The soft tricot knit fabric has a 50+ rating against UV rays. For fast diaper changes without too much sun exposure, a zipper opens the suit from the ankles, so you don't have to remove it completely.Polyester and LYCRA fabric is 50+ UPF rated.Mock neck collar covers vulnerable area at back of neck.Raglan style long sleeves.Front zipper runs to waist.Invisible zipper runs ankle-to-ankle via crotch for easy diaper changes.Flatlocked seams throughout for comfortInseam is 23cm (12mo).Care instructions: Machine wash cold. Do not use fabric softeners. Do not bleach. Hang to dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: MEC Shadow Sun Suit - Infants
